HEADING: WordPress Connect
MESSAGE_IMPORTING: We're currently importing your comments so we can serve them from your blog. You can keep this page open if you want, or you can close it and we'll email you when this is done. If you want to come back later and check the status, simply click the Import/Export button at the top.
MESSAGE_AFTER_DONE: After this is done we'll keep your comments in sync with your WordPress site so if you ever deactivate FastComments you won't lose any data.
